title: Civium Labs — Sandboxed Field Trials & A/B Guarded Rollouts
summary: A program/process for running tightly sandboxed experiments (policies, tools, UX) with pre-registered success metrics and rollback, surfaced on CoIndex.
rationale: We need disciplined experimentation that’s visible, reversible, and auditable across protectorates and product surfaces.
impact: Faster iteration with bounded risk and clearer evidence for scale-up decisions.
